title: Ep. - 213 - BEHIND THE ROYAL FAMILY
description:
Nick Bullen is a multi-award-winning television Producer. Throughout his career, Nick has built a rare and much cherished broadcast relationship with the British Royal Family. As a result, Spun Gold is now one of the world’s leading suppliers of royal programming and Nick has been dubbed “the King of Royal TV.” In 2018, Nick along with two partners, launched the world’s first OTT service dedicated to all things Royal – True Royalty; Vanity Fair hailed the service as “Netflix for the Royals.”


Nick is also Executive Producer of The Royal House of Windsor on Netflix. 



Reality Life with Kate Casey

Patreon: http://www.patreon.com/katecasey

Cameo: https://www.cameo.com/katecasey

Twitter: @katecasey

Instagram: @katecaseyca

Facebook Group: https://www.facebook.com/groups/113157919338245/

Facebook.com/loveandknuckles

Amazon List: http://www.amazon.com/shop/katecaseyca
